description: The Eleventh Harbinger of the Fatui, Tartaglia (Childe) is a Hydro bow user who excels at both ranged and melee combat, enabling powerful Hydro reactions.
info: Tartaglia is a 5★ Hydro DPS who excels at both ranged and melee combat, enabling powerful Hydro reactions. Build him for CRIT, ATK%, and Hydro DMG Bonus.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Cutting Torrent
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Hydro DMG and applies Riptide.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.desc: Tartaglia switches to melee stance, unleashing Hydro blades that deal AoE Hydro DMG. Normal and Charged Attacks in this stance apply Riptide.
skills.details_html:
Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
Switches to melee stance, unleashing Hydro blades that deal AoE Hydro DMG. Normal and Charged Attacks in this stance apply Riptide and deal increased Hydro DMG.

skills.name: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.desc: Tartaglia unleashes a powerful Hydro attack. Ranged: Fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow. Melee: Performs a large AoE slash. Both forms deal massive Hydro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Havoc: Obliteration
Ranged: Fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow. Melee: Performs a large AoE slash. Both forms deal massive Hydro DMG and apply Riptide.

passive_talents.name: Sword of Torrents
passive_talents.desc: When Tartaglia is in melee stance, CRIT Rate of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.

passive_talents.name: Master of Weaponry
passive_talents.desc: Increases Normal Attack level of all party members by 1.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.desc: Decreases Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's cooldown by 20%.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.desc: Riptide-triggered attacks deal 30% more DMG to enemies with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.desc: When Riptide is triggered, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Energy.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.desc: When Tartaglia is in melee stance, his attacks deal 30% increased DMG and convert all DMG to Hydro.
